titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the eligibility of computer technology and equipment development businesses for enterprise zone incentives.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 12/11/2008--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include a computer technology or equipment development business within the definition of a "qualified business" for purposes of enterprise zone tax incentives.
